alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 14 at 10:17AM EDT until March 15 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations ranging from 2 to 4 inches for lower elevations to 4 to 8 inches over the southeast portion of the county. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will produce some blowing and drifting snow in open areas. * WHERE...Jefferson county. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT Wednesday. The heaviest snow will fall through early this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult with poor visibility and snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute today.
info.instruction: Periods of snow will result in snow covered roads and limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
